1551.content: There are so many seasons of digimon and spin offs, which aspect of the digimon universe would you choose?
1551.title: Choose your Digimon

15511.content:
The digital world was a fascinating place to be if you were there to explore, being a place made up of nothing but code was strange in its self but to be full of digital creatures was another thing entirely as it wasn't something that seemed to be a natural occurring phenomena as people would be seeing more of the digital world crop up across the real world. Even though it seemed to be something that was unimaginable here it was existing with six children roaming she world trying to figure out how they got to here in the first place, being in summer camp wasn't all to exciting on it's own but being dropped in somewhere that they had no frame of reference to go on was worse, not knowing what was going to like around the corner has placed a seed of fear in their hearts as the digital world crawled with all manner of friend and foe. <br>
<br>
         One such child who was dropped into the digital world was a girl by the name of Sora, she was brave and fearless in her own ways, known as the digidestined of love Sora knew that she had to comfort the other kids that were trapped here with her no matter the cost. "Come on just a little further up this hill and we will be in a new zone" stated a little orange dinosaur looking creature who accompanied them along with other friendly inhabitants of the digital world, one such creatures that has taken a liking towards Sora was a digimon that went by the name of Biyomon. Her and Biyomon begun to explore the new done in which they had found themselves and the other children and digimon in, unlike the forest some in which they crash landed into this one was more rocky and rough, looking like a cross between a desert and mountains the area was not something that they were used too due to never being in such a area before the sun beat down on the kids draining their resolve to push forward.<br>
<br>
         Although they knew that other digimon had lived in the area before they had even arrived in this area it was another thing to assess the particular set of dangers these digimon could be to the children, with black gears taking hold of the mind of nice digimon corrupting them into something that not even their friends could reconize. One such digimon that has been tasked to getting rid of these children by the influence of the black gear embedded in it's back had been lurking in the peaks of the mountains waiting for the children to lower their guard so that they could strike. looking like an old woman, grandmotherly in appearance this particular division only known as Babamon had a plan to get rid of the bearer of the crest of love if she could only separate her from the rest of the kids.
15511.title: Season 1

info.brief_description: Allow Anime, and Manga girls to gain weight, and lose intel.
info.description:
Just like my other story (VG Female Brain Drain/Weight Gain), except with anime, and manga females. Same rules apply (Sorry about not adding a link).

Remember to make them become dumber than bimbo, and lose intel. first.

Also, slob is allowed, but brain drain comes first.

Oh, and new rule: No death.

Please add, and have fun.

Edit: Come on guys please add. I'm using a PSP to get on here, and it won't let me add much (Theres a 180 character limit when adding addititions on the PSP). Please add then.
